Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Shortcuts feature with tab-based category UI

- Add Shortcut entity with category management \(CRUD\)
- Implement tab-based UI for category navigation
- Add sidebar menu link for Shortcuts in all pages
- Maintain active tab after link/category operations
- Improve Todo list UI: align Save button with Edit/Delete buttons

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Dashboard feature as landing page

- Create DashboardController with summary data from Todo, Calendar, Shortcuts
- Add dashboard template with 4 cards: Active Todos, Today''s Events, Upcoming Events, Quick Shortcuts
- Add clickable links on Todo items to edit page
- Add Dashboard menu to sidebar in all pages
- Remove old HomeController that redirected to /todos

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
